languages.text: Дознание установило, что наиболее вероятным подстрекателем расправы был почтенный сенешаль Версериан, возмущенный убийством нескольких членов экипажа. Однако Абеляр отрицал свою причастность даже на допросе Вольного Торговца.

Interrogation revealed that the most likely instigator was the esteemed Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Дознание установило, что наиболее вероятным подстрекателем расправы был почтенный сенешаль Версериан, возмущенный убийством нескольких членов экипажа. Однако Абеляр отрицал свою причастность даже на допросе Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: The interrogation discovered that the most likely instigator was the honourable Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.

The interrogation discovered that the most likely instigator was the honourable Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.

Interrogation revealed that the most likely instigator was the esteemed Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.

Interrogation revealed that the most likely instigator was the esteemed Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.

Interrogation revealed that the most likely instigator was the esteemed Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: 审讯结果显示，最有可能的煽动者是受人尊敬的韦尔森总领，因为他某些船员遭到处决的结果愤怒不已。不过，即便是行商浪人亲自询问，阿贝拉德也拒绝承认自己与这件事情有关。
languages.original_text: Interrogation revealed that the most likely instigator was the esteemed Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 审讯结果显示，最有可能的煽动者是受人尊敬的韦尔森总领，因为他某些船员遭到处决的结果愤怒不已。不过，即便是行商浪人亲自询问，阿贝拉德也拒绝承认自己与这件事情有关。

languages.text: 尋問でわかったことは、最も可能性が高い扇動者は数人のクルーの処刑に激怒した家令長ウェルザリアンであるということだった。しかしアベラルドは、自由開拓者に尋問された時ですら自身の関与を否定した。
languages.original_text: Interrogation revealed that the most likely instigator was the esteemed Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 尋問でわかったことは、最も可能性が高い扇動者は数人のクルーの処刑に激怒した家令長ウェルザリアンであるということだった。しかしアベラルドは、自由開拓者に尋問された時ですら自身の関与を否定した。

languages.text: L'interrogatoire révéla que l'instigateur le plus probable n'était autre que l'honorable sénéchal Werserian, outré par l'exécution de plusieurs membres d'équipage. Toutefois, Abélard nia toute implication même lorsque {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} le questionna.
languages.original_text: Interrogation revealed that the most likely instigator was the esteemed Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: L'interrogatoire révéla que l'instigateur le plus probable n'était autre que l'honorable sénéchal Werserian, outré par l'exécution de plusieurs membres d'équipage. Toutefois, Abélard nia toute implication même lorsque {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} le questionna.

languages.text: Los interrogatorios revelaron que el causante más probable había sido el estimado Senescal Werserian, enfurecido por la ejecución de varios miembros de la tripulación. Sin embargo, Abelard negó estar involucrado incluso cuando {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se lo preguntó directamente.
languages.original_text: Interrogation revealed that the most likely instigator was the esteemed Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Los interrogatorios revelaron que el causante más probable había sido el estimado Senescal Werserian, enfurecido por la ejecución de varios miembros de la tripulación. Sin embargo, Abelard negó estar involucrado incluso cuando {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se lo preguntó directamente.

languages.text: Das Verhör zeigte, dass der wahrscheinlichste Urheber der geschätzte Truchsess Werserian war, erzürnt durch die Hinrichtung mehrerer Crewmitglieder. Allerdings leugnete Abelard seine Beteiligung sogar bei der Befragung durch {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}.
languages.original_text: Interrogation revealed that the most likely instigator was the esteemed Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Das Verhör zeigte, dass der wahrscheinlichste Urheber der geschätzte Truchsess Werserian war, erzürnt durch die Hinrichtung mehrerer Crewmitglieder. Allerdings leugnete Abelard seine Beteiligung sogar bei der Befragung durch {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}.

languages.text: Sorgular, kimi tayfaların infazına öfkelenen saygıdeğer Seneşal Werserian'ın muhtemel kışkırtıcının olduğunu gösterdi. Gelgelelim Abelard, Hür Tacir tarafından sorguya çekilmesine rağmen olayla bağını reddetti.
languages.original_text: Interrogation revealed that the most likely instigator was the esteemed Seneschal Werserian, outraged by the execution of several crew members. However, Abelard denied his involvement even when questioned by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Gerçekleştirilen sorgular, muhtemel kışkırtıcının, tayfalarından bazılarının infazına öfkelenen saygıdeğer Seneşal Werserian olduğunu gösterdi ancak Abelard, Hür Tacir tarafından sorguya çekilmesine rağmen olayla bağını reddetti.
